title: NUKI The last shapeshifter
body:
So this is my first champ idea 

ideally he would be played as a support champ

Nuki: the last shape shifter 

Nuki  is a vastayan and the last of his tribe, the raccoon people of ionia. Known for their trickery and sometimes not so innocent pranks the raccoon tribe have the ability to shape shift which they use to trick people unaware. Once Zed found out about their ability and powerful magic item, he sort out and slaughter the whole village, all but one. the only survivor of the battle, Nuki grabbed the magical item and ran away before anyone could find him.

The magical item was a plain looking sack, but with it allows Nuki to transform and help out his allies 


Passive: Gifts from the sack

Every 10 auto attacks Nuki's magical sack drops a random berry that an ally can pick up or an enemy can squish. There are 3 berries Health berry, Manna berry and Gold berry.

Q: Sack Whack 

Nuki swings his magical sack and causes any minions in the way to be pushed to the side. Also damages enemy champs

W: Power of the sack

Nuki gives his magical sack to an ally which grants a shield and bonus attack speed, or cast on to an enemy to stun and reduce attack speed. Nuki ccan not use his sack until effects have finished (so or abilities are unable to be used)

E: Heavy sack

Nuki Throws his sacks which slows all enemies champs and deals damage to them

R: Magical Sack

Nuki Shapeshifts in to a chosen ally champ for 8 seconds gaining all the basic abilities they have. This also gives the chosen ally a decaying shield for 2 seconds. 


That is my idea let me know what you think
